department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development
description: Request for Standing Offer solicitation to add up to fifty (50) Department Internal Standing Offers for one (1) year plus two (2) irreducible options to extend the term of the offer. Security requirements are associated with this requirement. \\r\\n \\r\\nc
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer

**Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)**

### Solicitation Details

* **RFND Number:** cb-5848-36565013
* **Transmission Date:** 2023-05-24
* **Closing Date:** 2023-07-21T14:00:00 EST
* **Modification Date:** 2023-07-21
* **Contract Start Date:** 2023-08-01
* **Contract End Date:** 2024-07-31

### Tender Description

This Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) solicitation is issued to satisfy the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development's (DFATD) requirement for the Independent Dispute Mediation or Arbitration Service.

### Government Sector

* **Sector:** Service Commercialization (SRV)
* **Category:** Independent Dispute Mediation or Arbitration Service (80122001)

### Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the following Trade Agreements:

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO AGP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement (CA-UKFTA)

### Security Requirements

This tender has security requirements that must be met. For more information, please consult the Government Security Program.

### Attached Documents

Please find the attached documents for this tender:

* [Initial Security Screening Form](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5848/initial_international_security_screening_form.pdf)
* [Application for Registration (ARF) Form](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5848/application_for_registration_arf_form_471-e.pdf)
* [RFSO Solicitation Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5848/23-225101---rfso---core-roster-of-mediators-en---amend-003.pdf)

### Contact Information

For any questions or inquiries regarding this tender, please contact
